org.jasr.currentcy.controller

Class HomeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasr.currentcy.controller.HomeController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/web")
public class HomeController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main web controller. It handles all REST requests from the main page, pertainin samples, snapshots and email subscriptions. This controller is a Rest Controller and is Swagger-annotated.

      • currencySnapshot

        @RequestMapping(value="/currencySnapshot",
                method=GET)
public java.util.List<CurrencySnapshot> currencySnapshot()
        Returns the latest sample taken for each registered exchange with all currencies available
        Returns:
        list values for all currencies for each exchange snapshot

      • snapshot

        @RequestMapping(value="/snapshot",
                method=GET)
public java.util.List<Sample> snapshot(@RequestParam
                                                                                                        Currencies currency)
        Returns the latest sample taken for each registered exchange.
        Parameters:
        currency - the currency on which the snapshot is taken
        Returns:
        list of latest samples for each of the registered exchanges

      • samples

        @RequestMapping(value="/{source}/samples",
                method=GET)
public Trend samples(@PathVariable
                                                                                              java.lang.String source,
                                                                                              @RequestParam
                                                                                              Currencies currency)
        Returns a series of the latest samples taken for the given exchange.
        Parameters:
        source - the exchange from which the sample is taken
        currency - The currency on which the sample is expressed
        Returns:
        A trend object containing the latest samples for the selected exchange

      • subscribe

        @RequestMapping(value="/email/subscribe",
                method=POST)
public void subscribe(@RequestParam
                                                                                               java.lang.String code,
                                                                                               @RequestParam
                                                                                               java.lang.String email)
        Subscribe an email address to notifications from the system
        Parameters:
        code - The code for the exchange to subscribe to
        email - The email address to subscribe to the application
